annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Aug. 14, 1974, 88 Stat. 470, Pub. L. 93-376, title VII, § 701a
as added Mar. 16, 1982, D.C. Law 4-88, § 3(n), 29 DCR 458

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 401(d) of Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Establishment and Comprehensive Ethics Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-298, January 29, 2012, 59 DCR 683).
